infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: AskToddy needs camera access to photograph construction projects for instant quotes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: AskToddy needs photo library access to select construction project images.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: AskToddy uses your location to find local suppliers and provide accurate regional pricing.
